title: From Vedic maths to zoonotic diseases: What ministries want in school curriculum - The Indian Express
content: From Vedic maths to zoonotic diseases: What ministries want in school curriculum  The Indian Express
description: The suggestions are being examined by experts involved in revising the National Curriculum Framework (NCF), which will subsequently inform the changes in the NCERT textbooks. Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan is in Bengaluru to hold discussions with members of the national steering committee leading the process.
